title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.1005 - Implementation requirements of a GDPIM plan (Other than a small LPG operator).
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.1005 - Implementation requirements of a GDPIM plan (Other than a small LPG operator). State Regulations

No later than August 2, 2011, a gas distribution operator
must develop and implement a GDPIM program that includes a written GDPIM plan
as specified in section
255.1007
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.1005

Amended

New

York State Register January 4, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 01, eff. 12/16/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
